text:
Susete Pereira
Product Manager
Key achievements/experience:
More than 18 years experience in health sector handling:
• Drive immunology business success by defining and implementing the local marketing plans 
and ensuring that the commercial teams have the knowledge and the tools required for that.
• Achieve the quantitative (sales, Market Share, etc.) and qualitative targets for the 
immunology product line in 5 years plan
• Implement and develop: efficient cost management and forecasting accuracy; clear 
positioning, messaging and branding guidelines;
• Develop and manage impactful events in terms of congress and standalone scientific 
meetings and workshops
Strengths:
